derivation: probably from the same as G3823 (πάλιν) (through the idea of oscillatory repetition);
strongs_def: (adverbially) anew, i.e. (of place) back, (of time) once more, or (conjunctionally) furthermore or on the other hand
outline:
1. anew, again
    1. renewal or repetition of the action
    2. again, anew
  2. again, i.e. further, moreover
  3. in turn, on the other hand
